content:
I'm so glad you're a fan of "The Good Place"!

If you're looking for shows similar to "Friends" or "How I Met Your Mother", I've got some great recommendations for you:

**Similar to "Friends"**

1. **New Girl**: As I mentioned earlier, it's a quirky and charming show about a group of friends living together in a Los Angeles loft. It has a similar feel to "Friends" with its witty banter, relatable characters, and hilarious situations.
2. **The Big Bang Theory**: While it's more focused on geek culture, it's a show about a group of friends navigating their lives, relationships, and careers. It has a similar "hangout" feel to "Friends".
3. **Happy Endings**: A short-lived but critically acclaimed show about a group of friends living in Chicago. It's fast-paced, witty, and has a similar tone to "Friends".
4. **Friends from College**: A Netflix original series that follows a group of friends from Harvard who are now in their 40s. It explores their relationships, careers, and personal growth.

**Similar to "How I Met Your Mother"**

1. **Happyish**: A comedy series that follows a group of friends navigating their 40s, relationships, and careers. It has a similar tone and style to "HIMYM".
2. **Don't Trust the B---- in Apartment 23**: A quirky show about a young woman who moves to New York City and becomes friends with her eccentric neighbor. It has a similar "buddy comedy" feel to "HIMYM".
3. **The League**: A comedy series about a group of friends who are part of a fantasy football league. It's raunchy, hilarious, and has a similar "guys' night out" feel to "HIMYM".
4. **Younger**: A comedy-drama series about a single mother in her 40s who pretends to be a 26-year-old in order to get a job in the competitive world of publishing. It has a similar "will-they-won't-they" romance feel to "HIMYM".

All of these shows have a similar tone, style, and focus on relationships and friendships that made "Friends" and "How I Met Your Mother" so beloved. I hope you find a new favorite show!
